name: HVAP
description:
HVAP is a game I started in 2015 because I hated War Thunder but wanted to play War Thunder. It's a permadeath tank shooter, set in an endless desert where you can wander for eternity. Enemy tanks hole up on hills and wander the desert, assaulting you as you scrounge for ammo.

It figures that the game I teach myself Unity with would be the one that takes six years to finish. . .

SOURCE: Available for use and modification so long as anything you use, wholly or in part, is attributed to this Itch page.
